lead_paragraph: Formula One has decided to delay the introduction of a proposed cockpit-protection device by one year, deciding to develop it further before adopting some form of the concept for 2018.

headline.print_headline: F1 Cockpit Protection System Delayed Until 2018
headline.main: F1 Cockpit Protection System Delayed Until 2018

snippet: Formula One has decided to delay the introduction of a proposed cockpit-protection device by one year, deciding to develop it further before adopting some form of the concept for 2018....
